story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_0200_10: I know how it sounds, but I really heard it.
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_0300_10: The same voice I heard before I arrived in Hisui...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_0600_10:
Professor Bellis, you said that there’s a connection
between the stones we’ve been discussing and the
recent changes on Pasio, right?
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_0700_10: I’ve also recently come to Pasio.
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_0800_10:
The fact that I came here, the discovery of the
stones, and the voice of Arceus...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_0900_10: It’s hard to believe that they’re not all connected.
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1000_10:
According to the legends of Sinnoh, Arceus is the
creator of all things...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
If you consider the fascinating properties the stones
have, it actually makes sense.
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1200_10: So, do you think Rei actually heard Arceus’s voice?
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Adaman and Irida were also saying that Dialga
and Palkia had communicated their will to them
here on Pasio...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
So far, the stones have been found by sync pairs
who’re skilled in battling...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1700_10:
It’s as though the stones are seeking out strong
sync pairs...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1800_10:
Perhaps someone or something is conspiring to
make strong sync pairs find the stones.
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_1900_10: One hypothesis is that it might be Arceus’s doing.
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_2000_10:
Well, in order to find out what’s happening
on Pasio...
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_2100_10:
maybe we can speak with those who have
“close ties.”
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_2200_10: Those who have “close ties”? Do you mean—?
story_stone_04_01000/2401_1201_2400_10:
The other Pokémon mentioned in the legends of
Sinnoh, just like Arceus!
